name: Escape Series: Escape Barbara's House
description:
a classic escape the room game, your goal is to escape Barbara's home, she was your wife before she die, and you got stuck inside the house. (because you're too lazy to do anything xD)

4 rooms 1 Basement and a lot of puzzles to be solved.

Leave your comment on how to improve the game, what puzzle you wish to see, and what changes I should make!

This is the final game of the Escape Series.
